TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RijndaelManaged extends System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael
Public NotInheritable Class RijndaelManaged Inherits Rijndael
public ref class RijndaelManaged sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::Rijndael

summary.span: 存取 演算法的 Managed 版本。

span.span: Accesses the managed version of the algorithm.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此演算法支援 128、 192 或 256 位元; 的金鑰長度預設為 256 位元。This algorithm supports key lengths of 128, 192, or 256 bits; defaulting to 256 bits. 此演算法支援 128、 192 或 256 位元; 區塊大小預設為 128 位元 (-相容)。This algorithm supports block sizes of 128, 192, or 256 bits; defaulting to 128 bits (-compatible). 演算法是的前置項。The algorithm is the predecessor of . 您應該使用類別而不是。You should use the class instead of . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文章[Rijndael 之間的差異和 AES](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200932) .NET 安全性部落格。For more information, see the entry [The Differences Between Rijndael and AES](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200932) in the .NET Security blog. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何加密和解密使用範例資料`RijndaelManaged`類別。The following example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt sample data using the `RijndaelManaged` class. [!code-cpp[RijndaelManaged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RijndaelManaged Example/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RijndaelManaged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RijndaelManaged Example/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RijndaelManaged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/RijndaelManaged Example/VB/class1.vb#1)]

span.span: Creates a symmetric decryptor object with the specified and initialization vector ().
A symmetric decryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會解密加密的訊息建立使用多載相同的簽章。This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the overload with the same signature. `rgbkey`大小必須是 128、 192 或 256 位元。The `rgbkey` size must be 128, 192, or 256 bits. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來解密使用相同的簽章參數編碼的訊息。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to decrypt messages encoded with the same signature parameter.
